Project Name: Attorney Hub (Pages) - Identify if they are using the About page as the Attorney Hub (very common)
Location Hub (Pages if not multi or Hub not present)

1. Core Practice Area Page – Divorce
Sequencing: Build first as a core hub; used for navigation, homepage links, and cluster authority.
Description: Build the Divorce core hub page to define the service, align to high-intent queries, and act as the primary internal linking source for related procedural and situational pages within this cluster.
Impact: Consolidates topical authority into a single canonical hub, improving crawl prioritization and internal PageRank flow. Strengthens relevance and ranking stability for core Divorce searches while providing a scalable structure for supporting pages.

8. Procedural Page – Contested Divorce (Linked from: Divorce Practice Area Page)
